choices: A baby boy's room..... and you're in a crib.
A baby girl's room..... and you're in a crib,
A little boy's room.... and you're in little boy's bed.
A little girl's room.... and you're in a little girls bed.
A mom and dad's room.... and you're in a newborn's bassinet.
1.content:
You had fallen asleep in your bedroom, after a hard stressful day. You had been watching toons about Mickey and his friends. Sometimes, you wish you could be part of their world, they seemed to have no worries in their reality, even if it was a toon world, and didn't exist.... at least, that is what you thought, before falling alseep.

When you wake up, you see yourself in a cartoon version of.....
1.title: You're a baby mouse.

11.content:
Slowly, youreyes open up. Looking around, you can feel every hair on your head stand on edge.

'What...is this?' You think to yourself, bewildered by your new surroundings. Looking down at your hands, you see two tiny gloved hands with four digits.

Just then, you hear the door creak open.
11.title: Dazed & Confused

112.content: You cry to alert the nearest person that could help you. Who comes in
112.title: Cry

113.content: The door opens and Minnie Mouse comes into your room. Wake up little on we have a big day she picked you up and checks your diaper. Is your diaper clean wet messy or both
113.title: Pretend to be asleep

1133.content: Which is it messy or both
1133.title: Messy or both

11332.content: Oh my your diaper is really full let me just change and dress you and we’ll be on our way. Minnie opens your diaper and wipes both your front and back with wet wipes. Legs up baby. You do as she commands. She powders you and puts you in a
11332.title: Both

12.content:
Slowly, youreyes open up. Looking around, you can feel every hair on your head stand on edge.

'What...is this?' You think to yourself, bewildered by your new surroundings. Looking down at your hands, you see two tiny gloved hands with four digits.

Just then, you hear the door creak open. (I copied the boy one because the text was gender neutral.)
12.title: A baby girl's room..... and you're in a...

121.content: Do you succeed fail or does someone see you trying to climb out
121.title: Climb over the crib

choices: Minnie Mouse came into the room.
Mickey Mouse came into the room.
Mickey and Minnie both came into the room.
Mickey and Minnie, and some children (your older, caring siblings.) came in.
Some children came in. (Your older, caring siblings.)
13.content:
Everything was set up for a little boy's dream. The walls were a soft blue, and there were pictures of racecars with.... is that Mickey Mouse in the driver's seat? Anyways, they were plastered all over the walls. There was a play area in the room with little boy toys and everything. You also saw a child's TV sitting on a boy's drawer. As, you began to sit up, you felt a crinkle on your bottom. That made you shoot up in surprise. You uncovered yourself from the blanket that was on you. And were in for a bit of a shock. You saw that you were in a red onsie PJ's, but they could not hide was underneath. You were wearing padding. More then likely what you called in your world Goodnites, but puffier. but that wasn't the thing that shocked you most.

You saw your feet, and they were no longer your normal bare skin feet, but feet that had black fur covering them. You pinched them to make sure they were yours, and you felt the pinch which told you two things.

One, they were your feet, and two, this was no dream. You had been cartoonized, and were apparently a young boy who was still in need of potty training.

You don't know why, but you didn't feel alarmed enough to scream. It was more like a dream coming true. You were young again, and apparently you were a cartoon now. Your dream was about to come true even more as the door begins to open.......
13.title: Little Boy, Little bed.

133.content:
Mickey and Minnie mouse stand in the doorway, they look a little different than in the cartoons, you think, but not to much so that you can figure out what's different.
"There's our precious!" Minnie exclaims as they come in quickly. You go to speak, but all that comes out is a little "uh-" before Mickey has scooped you up into his arms and laid you across a Mat you hadn't noticed.
You're too busy looking at the wall above a mirror on your dreser that reads "Morty".
You hardly notice Mickey cooing to you as you work out that your name is Morty. You're named for Mickey's nephew, Minnie's uncle and Daddy's friend Mortimer. Wait- daddy? You catch yourself wondering, and wondering how you know that stuff. You're so busy in thought you hardly notice you've started to suck your thumb.
But you do notice Mickey is changing your diaper. Wait,diaper?!
That got your attention but Mickey is almost done as Minnie is laying out your clothes.
It turns out the reason other Mortimers are more well-known is because this one is a little not-too-bright, despite being five or six, he's still in diapers and play with thumb-sucking. You didn't even notice you were doing it.
"Is my special little guy ready for-?" Minnie asked
133.title: Mickey and Minnie both came into the room.

choices: A large breakfast at the table
Your older, normal siblings, they didn't even need diapers
1332.content:
"To start the day?"
After a confused second, you just nod. Minnie helpped you get dressed in some nice slacks that fit over your diaper and a warm shirt, you find yourself somewhat relaxed for a second as you can't help but suck your thumb and Mickey takes your free-hand and walks you downstairs to be greeted by
1332.title: "To start the day?"

13323.content: You saw a large woman about as chubby as Ms.Cluck...in fact is Ms.Cluck as she let out a few clucks you would guess are good mornings as she held out her feathered arms to hold you. As she started to cluck about the day you and her where going to have Minnie nodding as you yourself was wondering what she was saying.
13323.title: A very large nanny

choices: There's rooms on set in cAse he needs a break (Mickey is still acting)
The club didn't open until much later (he's retired, owns house of mouse)
133231.content:
It sounded boring as she talked about maybe having to go to the store. You wanted to stay and play with your toys.

Ms.Cluck was still clucking about it as she helpped you sit at the table, tying one napkin around your neck and another sitting on your lap before she went and got you some breakfast. Waiting for it, you again start sucking your thumb bored and wiggling from the crinkling of your diaper, until you notice Daddy- no, Mickey is getting his coat on. Where is he going? You wonder.
"Dad-dee!" You choke out after a few moments of trying, it doesn't sound quite like how a five year old would say it, but you're still learning to talk.
"Oh, Morty. You know Daddy has to work today- you be good for Ms.Cluck though, okay big guy?" He asked as he ruffled the top of your head. But you know if you went with him you could find answers. You try to aruge starting with a 'but', but all that comes out again is a shirking, childish "Da-dee!"
Ms.Cluck moves closer to calm you down from what seems like a child upset his parents have to leave as she sets down a pancake topped with fruit for you to eat. But Daddy gets an idea:
"....i suppose it wouldn't be too hard if he came with me for a few hours dear?" He asked Mickey. "Of course, Ms.Cluck'll come too, besides-"
133231.title: Boring day

1333.content: What other story do you want
1333.title: Some other story

Anyways, they were plastered all over the walls. There was a play area in the room with little girl toys and everything. You also saw a child's TV sitting on a girl’s drawer. As, you began to sit up, you felt a crinkle on your bottom. That made you shoot up in surprise. You uncovered yourself from the blanket that was on you. And were in for a bit of a shock. You saw that you were in a pink onsie PJ's, but they could not hide was underneath. You were wearing padding. More then likely what you called in your world Goodnites, but puffier. but that wasn't the thing that shocked you most.

You saw your feet, and they were no longer your normal bare skin feet, but feet that had black fur covering them. You pinched them to make sure they were yours, and you felt the pinch which told you two things.

One, they were your feet, and two, this was no dream. You had been cartoonized, and were apparently a little girl who was still in need of potty training.

You don't know why, but you didn't feel alarmed enough to scream. It was more like a dream coming true. You were young again, and apparently you were a cartoon now. Your dream was about to come true even more as the door begins to open.......
14.title: A little girl's room.... and you're in ...

141.content: Your mom Minnie Mouse walks in the door you see your name is Miranda mouse because of the sign that say Miranda above the tv. Hello Miranda how are you are you ready for
141.title: Minnie Mouse came into the room.

15.content:
You saw everything in a cartoon fashion, and were amazed, when you tried to sit up, but for some reason, all the strength in your back seemed to have vanished, like you were paralyzed, but you could still feel everything, and you could swear that there was something on your lower back end you didn't have before. As you lift your hands you see arms with black cartoon fur, and white gloved hands, and as you try to roll a bit, you hear a crinkle on your lower end, and that was enough to tell, you that you were now in the body of a baby. And if memory served you right, you looked like Mickey and Minnie. This was enough to startle you, making you yelp.

You covered your mouth with your gloved hands after hearing your voice now having that of a baby. This seemed to alert someone, and when you see them peek into, what you now realized was a bassinet, you see a face that was so distinct, and couldn't be mistaken for any other face. Minnie Mouse, and she had a maternal smile on her face, as she said, "Aww, good morning my sweet..."
15.title: Mickey and Minnie's bedroom in a bassinet.

choices: Minnie exposed her breasts..!.. those weren't in the cartoons on TV.
Minnie reveals a bottle filled with mama's milk
Minnie reveals a bottle filled with formula.
151.content:
Well, that settled it, you were a baby boy mouse, and Minnie's son. You weren't sure if Mickey was your father, but you had a pretty good guess he was since a pair of his iconic pants were sitting in a hamper you saw as Minnie lifted you out of the bassinet. She then laid on the bed that had been sitting next to the bassinet you had been in, and was cradling you in her arms. "Hmhm, is my little Timmy Mouse hungry?" Minnie asked you motherly.

Well, Timmy Mouse was your mouse name now, and as you were about to say something, your tummy growled and gave you away. "Aww, yes he is," Minnie cooed.

This is when....
151.title: "Baby Boy."

choices: A little boy/girl mouse toddled in.
A 10 year old boy/girl mouse walked in.
1511.content:
Minnie soon pulled the left part of her night gown down and revealed a milk fill breast. If memory had served you right, the show on TV never showed those in the cartoons before. This told that this was no dream, this was real, because you mind could have never conjured something this detailed up. At the same time you had been thinking all of this, you had covered your face, feeling rude to look at Minnie's exposed breast. Minnie chuckled, "Aww, already such a little gentleman. Don't worry sweetie, you can look, this is how Mama's gonna feed you."

You slowly pulled your gloved hands away, and, even though you had some of your grown up mind in tact, you didn't have any perverted thoughts going through your mind as you saw her breasts. Perhaps your new baby form was slowly taking affect on your mind, and was starting to make you more innocent to fit your new body. "There we go dear. Now, time for your breakfast," Minnie said, as she pulled your head closer to her breast.

Part of you wasn't sure about breastfeeding, but most of you was saying that you needed your new Mama's milk. Besides, it seems you wouldn't be able to have anything else. And thankfully she wasn't resorting to nasty formula.

You soon latched onto her nipple, and began to suckle, and you were rewarded with sweet and delicious nectar that only a mother could provide. "Aww, there we go," Minnie said as she kissed your forehead while you nursed.

As you had your delicious and nutritious meal, the door to the room opened, and....
1511.title: Minnie's feeding you Mama's milk

15111.content: As you where eating Mickey walked in smiling. "Why the smile Mickey?" Minnie said as she slowly went back to keeping a eye on you. "Donald and Goofy where asking about a play date with there kids what you say Minnie? A little get together with our friends?" Mickey was smiling as he said that but every now and then you caught him glancing at you. As you finished your meal your put over Minnie's shoulder and burped as you are returned to Minnie's cradling arms she slowly rocked you as she said....
15111.title: Mickey Mouse walked in.

151111.content: Minnie agreed to the party they set a time and set up for the party. When the party started they put you in a play pin a little time slipped by and Donald and Daisy Duck show up with there 3 kids Mary,Carry, and Donald Jr. (2 girls and a boy). As you watch the young ducklings play you hear a goofy cry as Goofy tumbled threw the door and his wife Sylvia soon fallowed with a soft smiles before looking in the play pen she looked at you and waved before putting her and goofy's kid in the pen. As you looked at the kid you saw he was wearing a navy out fit with the name Gilligan stitched on the front. The parents looked at all of you and put balls and building blocks in the pen with you. What do you pick?
151111.title: Yes

1511111.content: As you squirmed on the ground a little you slowly started to move across the floor for a new born you did the best you could to move. Mary and Carry Duck where crawling for the most part as there brother was kinda just minding his own. Gilligan already had a toy a blue and red ball with shapes on it that he was bouncing on the floor a bit. After what felt like forever you reached the ball and as you put your little hand on it you felt hands around your tummy who was it picking you up?
1511111.title: A shiny red ball

151112.content:
"I'm sorry Mickey but remember we got some things to do before we go back to work." she said as she started to walk to the living room. "How about you go and call both of them and tell them that we will do it next weekend and have a barbecue to make up for the play date change. Mickey looked a little upset but nodded and went to the kitchen to call his friends. Minnie set you down in front of a TV and put on a educational baby show who's host seams to be your new father. You watch as Minnie goes and gets ready to go out with you as your focus goes to the show but slowly you feel something in your mind go as you start to giggle as your TV daddy said "Right red is the color of the Fire truck."


Do you snap out of it?
151112.title: No

1511121.content: As your mind snaps back to normal you blinked a few as the TV was turned off blinking a few times you saw Minnie with two bags one that was bigger then the other. You looked up at her as she picked you said. "Come on sweetie it's time to go to the....."
1511121.title: Yes

15111212.content: Well what is it Doctor or the Mall?
15111212.title: Doctor or Mall

151112122.content:
As your strapped into the car and Minnie gets in she starts the car and off to the Mall you went. Once you got there she put you in a stroller and made sure you where comfy and warm as she rolled you threw the doors you saw Max and Roxanne walk. Roxanne saw you and complemented Minnie on her baby after Roxanne offered to baby sit she gave Minnie her number and went back to walking with Max you was playing with you a little bit. As you and Minnie went into the mall you saw a Mall of gods (so to speaks) it huge with a big pretty fountain in the middle of it. As Minnie said "So what shall we do for our first mommy and me day." she looked at the store and giggles as she listed off a few stores 4 stick out to you.

1. Baby Day Parade or Mommy little Angle (both are baby care places)

2.Baby mark and Mouse for her (One's baby care others a woman clothing shop)
151112122.title: Mall

1511122.content:
As your mind slips back more and more you forgot you where a human and where forever Minnie's and Mickey's son for the rest of your life. As your life went on you took your dad's place when it was time. That's where you met your wife Mary Donald Ducks daughter. Your life was good






THE END
1511122.title: No

15112.title: A little boy/girl mouse toddled in.

info.brief_description: You entered Toon Town, where Mickey and Minnie live. And somehow, you're their child.
info.description:
So, one moment, you're sleeping in your bed. The next time you wake up, you're in toon town, and in Mickey and Minnie's house..... and in this particular reality, they're married...... and you're their little bundle of joy.... or maybe one of a group of a bundle of joy. It's up to you, and you get to choose your age, and age regresssion is included down to newborn status and pregnancy is alright, but Minnie can't be pregnant with you, the main character.

Things not allowed.
1. Vore/Unbirth
2. Death.
3. Regression to the point where Minnie becomes pregnant with you, or even father then that.
4. Abuse of any characters.
5. Gay couples.
6. Children involved in sexual acts. (This does not include breastfeeding.)
7. Gore.
8. Heavy mentions of diaper usage.
9. Making Mickey and Minnie unloving parents.
10. Making any of Mickey and Minnie's friends acting unloving or evil, even Pete.
11. No Adult Babies. It will just make the story feel awkward. Like Mickey and Minnie taking care of Minnie's dad Marcus Mouse, and you end up in his body, or Mickey and Minnie are taking care of Mortimer Mouse as a form a punishment to get back at his antics, treating him like a baby, and your mind ends up in his body.
12. Branching off 11, No becoming one of the already existing characters, but babyfied. (You are your own original character.)

These rules are subject to change if I so choose. Email me on site if you have any questions. Chapters will be deleted if you break the rules or try to use loopholes to get around them. Have fun with the story. Help me get at least 75 chapters.
info.pretty_title: You're Mickey and Minnie's Little One.
